Physics::ICallback Class Reference

virtual bool CollisionOccurred (uint32 bodyA, uint32 bodyB, PMath::Vec3f pos, PMath::Vec3f normal, PMath::Vec3f forceA, PMath::Vec3f forceB)=0

Detailed Description

An application receives collision callbacks via this class.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool Physics::ICallback::CollisionOccurred (  uint32  bodyA,
uint32  bodyB,
PMath::Vec3f  pos,
PMath::Vec3f  normal,
PMath::Vec3f  forceA,
PMath::Vec3f  forceB
)  [pure virtual]
 

Override this function to respond to collisions as a they occur

Parameters:
bodyA The first participant in the collision
bodyB The second participant in the collision
pos The position of the contact
normal The normal of the contact, relative to bodyA
forceA The force that was applied to bodyA to resolve the collision
forceB The force that was applied to bodyB to resolve the collision
Returns:
true if the collision should be resolved, false if it should be ignored
